events.text: The Enemies Event Sheet contains the code for the MonsterSpawner object, the AI for the various masks as well as the code managing passive creatures like insects, animals and cars. The NPC which can be challenged and who rely on special AI are also detailed in the following Event Sheet.
This boolean can be turned On by the EnemyTurn Function. It will inhibit player actions until it is disabled (at the end of the enemies' turns).
This core function is outside the Functions Event Sheet as it is central to the whole deployment of the AI code, which in itself, due to its scope, had to be placed on an independent Event Sheet.

events.functionDescription: This Function triggers a new turn for the enemies AIs.

children.text: The enemy will attack the player otherwise.

events.title: Masks AI
events.description: All the codes for the AI masks. Each AI is characterized by an integer and can be associated on any mask using an instance variable, which is a convenient way to try out new mechanisms.
